name: Simple Beginnings (MMORPG)
description:
Extract the file anywhere and run the launcher.patcher.exe file. it will download the game and update it as new updates are made availble.

Please note, you must have a valid account to login to the game. to get a valid account you can become a patreon and subscrib to one of the tiers. the minium you can subscrib for is 5$. the link to my patreon account is below. Once you have subscribed I will send you a login and a password with 24 hours for the game.

Also, this is a work in progress. If you find something that does not work, please let us know via email.

https://www.patreon.com/2810046ontarioinc
